Package FX.Model.Entities.Brick

Interface Crackable

All Known Implementing Classes:
CementBrick, ReinforcedSteelBrick
public interface Crackable
this interface is used to allow the class to have crackable feature

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    static int DOWN
    this is used to determine which direction does the collision occur to the brick.
    static int LEFT
    this is used to determine which direction does the collision occur to the brick.
    static int RIGHT
    this is used to determine which direction does the collision occur to the brick.
    static int UP
    this is used to determine which direction does the collision occur to the brick.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    Crack getCrack()
    this abstract method is used to get the crack object which contains the logic used to create the crack path.
    javafx.scene.shape.Path getCrackPath()
    this method is used to get the crack path which contains the info on how to draw the crack.
    void setCrack​(Crack crack)
    this method is used to set the crack object.
    void setCrackPath​(javafx.scene.shape.Path path)
    this method is used to set the crack path generated by the crack object.

  • Method Details

    • getCrack

      Crack getCrack()
      this abstract method is used to get the crack object which contains the logic used to create the crack path.
      Returns:
      it returns a crack object

    • setCrack

      void setCrack​(Crack crack)
      this method is used to set the crack object.
      Parameters:
      crack - this is the crack object used to set into a variable.

    • setCrackPath

      void setCrackPath​(javafx.scene.shape.Path path)
      this method is used to set the crack path generated by the crack object.
      Parameters:
      path - this is the path object which contains the info on how to draw the crack into a variable.

    • getCrackPath

      javafx.scene.shape.Path getCrackPath()
      this method is used to get the crack path which contains the info on how to draw the crack.
      Returns:
      this returns the path object which contains the information need to draw the crack line.
